about_the_game:
Stuck on a mining planet, your only hope for escaping are the shimmering veins of gold beneath the surface.
In You struck gold, you embark on a strategic puzzle-solving journey. Your deck of cards is both your tool to mine precious gold and secure your ticket home!

Features

  • Card-Based Gameplay: Utilize a unique deck of cards, each with special abilities and tools to aid your mining efforts
  • Quick Puzzles: Enjoy fast-paced challenging puzzles that keep you engaged and on your toes
  • Strategic Depth: Choose and place your cards carefully on the board, balancing mining the gold with the more special tools at your disposal
  • A Distinctive Look: A cozy pixel-art game that uses charming 2.5D models for the cards

Will you earn your fare back home, or will the planet's mining company keep you trapped forever? Test your skills in You struck gold and discover if you have what it takes to escape!
